title: AFKs Promos
body: I have lost count of how many promos I've lost because of afks I think its around 11 now and its really starting to piss me off and make me wanna quit LoL I was Gold 5 and then fell to S3 because I have gotten so many afks and trolls in a row its not funny its really stupid

replies.body: Yeah mate, that sucks. I've noticed a lot of afkers lately. In almost every game someone is disconnected for a least a short time. Is that because of Netflix, or people using Wi-fi, or just Tony Abbott? xD

> [{quoted}](name=Bookbash,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=iM2Zyu4r,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-09-07T16:40:05.308+0000)
>
> Yeah mate, that sucks. I've noticed a lot of afkers lately. In almost every game someone is disconnected for a least a short time. Is that because of Netflix, or people using Wi-fi, or just Tony Abbott? xD

pretty much but it only ever happens in promos I just got a feeder then because they didn't get yasuo and they were a smurf
